Kinder Morgan Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
Positive Sentiment:
Higher natural gas volumes on its pipelines drove a rise in second-quarter profit, underscoring the company’s core cash flow stability.

Positive Sentiment:

Shares of Kinder Morgan, Inc. (NYSE:KMI) moved today as investors digested the company’s second-quarter results, updated fiscal 2025 guidance and operational updates.
